message: Failed at least one business validation rules

errors.description: [IRASC5-054]-An Invoice MUST have the Invoice total amount with GST (IBT-112).
[IRASC5-055]-The Invoice total amount with GST (IBT-112) MUST not be negative.
[IRASC5-056]-The currency code MUST be provided for the Invoice total amount with GST (IBT-112).
